General.Name: Huang Long Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Huang Long Development Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic components in Taiwan and Mainland China. It also develops, leases, and sells residential buildings. The company was formerly known as Neng Tyi Precision Industries Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huang Long Development Co.,Ltd. in June 2018. Huang Long Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
